content: Kun Xu - Homepage Kun Xu () I am an associate professor in the Department of Computer Science and Technology of Tsinghua University. I received my doctor and bachelor degree from Department of Computer Science and Technology, Tsinghua University in 2009 and in 2005, respectively. My research interests include: real-time rendering, image/video editing, and 3D scene synthesis. My contact info: Email: xukun (at) tsinghua.edu.cn Office: Ziqiang Tech Building 1-1002, Tsinghua Univeristy, Beijing, P.R.
